events:
Microsoft Events Catalog https://events.microsoft.com May-2021 June-2021 A fully-searchable catalog of events conducted by Microsoft and their partners.
Microsoft Ignite https://myignite.microsoft.com/home 02-Nov-2021 04-Nov-2021 Until our next event experience, check out the latest learning opportunities, recent event highlights, and more.
New Speaker Library - Call for Sessions https://sessionize.com/new-stars-speaker-improvement 11-Aug-2021 31-Dec-2021 We're looking for seasoned speakers, willing to share their experience and knowledge to help new and old stars to build better presentations. Potential topics could include but are not limited to: - creating an abstract - building a slide deck - designing session flows - turning a slide deck into a presentation - accessible presentations - inclusive language - or how to pre-record a session. Our goal is to build a free content library that’s available to everyone to help them improve their sessions – no matter if it’s their first or 100th, even though we think new speakers will benefit the most.
SQL Friday Autumn 2021 https://sqlfriday.net 20-Aug-2021 17-Dec-2021 SQL Friday is a weekly online event, happening at noon Central European Time every Friday. One one-hour session is presented in a Microsoft Teams meeting for a live, online audience, then recorded and later published to Youtube. The topic for the autumn 2021 season of Sql Friday is Sql Server. SQL Server in containers, Sql Server in the cloud, Sql Server on-premise, T-Sql fundamentals, advanced T-Sql, performance tuning, engine internals, HA/DR overview etc.
Future Data Driven Summit http://datadrivencommunity.com 29-Sept-2021 29-Sept-2021 Future Data Driven is a marquee, online event focusing on the comprehensive Microsoft Data Platform. Our mission is to inform and update attendees with Data and AI, DevOps and DataOps, PowerBI and Visualization, Integration and Automation and cloud infrastructure. We are excited to welcome you to participate at our free first ever Future Data Driven online event.
Azure data governance: Maximize the Value of Your Data in the Cloud https://azuredatagovernance.eventcore.com/auth/login?ocid=AID3037774_QSG_542286 28-Sept-2021 28-Sept-2021 Achieve unified data governance with Azure Purview Learn to unify and simplify your data management at this free digital event.
Get a holistic, up-to-date map of all your on-premises, multicloud, and software as a service (SaaS) data with Azure Purview, a unified data governance solution. Join Microsoft Corporate Vice President Rohan Kumar at this free digital event for demos and deep dives—and be among the first to hear major product announcements.
Register now to:
-Learn to create a comprehensive, automated map of all your data. -See how Azure Purview works with Azure Synapse Analytics, Power BI, and the rest of your data estate to deliver timely, reliable insights. -Watch in-depth demos of product features including Azure Purview Data Map and Data Catalog. -Ask Azure experts your data governance questions in the live Q and A.
Data Saturday #10 Sofia https://datasaturdays.com/2021-09-11-datasaturday0011/ 09-Oct-2021 09-Oct-2021 Data Saturday #10 Sofia is a free one-day event for professionals who use the Microsoft data platform. This community event offer content across data management, cloud and hybrid architecture, analytics, business intelligence, AI, and more. We are planning event to be a hybrid event.
dataMinds Connect https://datamindsconnect.be/ 11-Oct-2021 12-Oct-2021 dataMinds Connect is a 2 day in-person event in the wonderful city of Mechelen, Belgium. It’s an IT related event with a specific focus on the Microsoft Data and AI Platform, including sessions tailored for personal and professional growth.
Go ahead and clearly mark Monday October 11th and Tuesday October 12th 2021 in your schedule, as these will be 2 days you don’t want to miss!
DBCC International 2021 https://sessionize.com/dbcc-international-2021/ 15-Oct-2021 15-Oct-2021 After the success of the Data Blaster Community Conference (DBCC) in June and both DBCC events in 2020, we will be organizing DBCC International this year again. On Friday October 15th, 2021 the time has come to continue the virtual conference format on an international level. In three parallel tracks, 21 short lectures are planned for you, which represent many topics from the Data Platform in a varied format and provide exciting content for both beginners and advanced participants. The Teams links that you need to participate in the conference will be inserted on this page as soon as the schedule has been set. By the way, you don’t have to register, anyone who clicks on the corresponding team link can simply participate.
Data Saturday #13 Minnesota https://datasaturdays.com/2021-10-16-datasaturday0013/ 16-Oct-2021 16-Oct-2021 A free virtual event for all data learners and professionals seeking to learn! This community event offer content across data management, cloud and hybrid architecture, analytics, business intelligence, AI, and more. It will be held virtually due to pandemic.
The Hybrid Data Cloud Game Show with Portworx and Azure Arc https://bit.ly/3AZUSCr 21-October-2021 21-October-2021 Who will come away with the Azure Arc cup? This light hearted competition between those that developed the product from Microsoft, Jes Schultz and Dhananjay Mahajan or those that wrote the book about it Anthony Nocentino and Ben Weissman. This quiz game show style game will not only determine the winner of the Arc cup challenge but give you an opportunity to learn about hybrid data: Azure Arc-enabled data services, containers, Portworx and many more nuggets of knowledge.
You will not want to miss this fun session of learning!
New Stars of Data https://www.newstarsofdata.com 22-Oct-2021 22-Oct-2021 New Stars of Data is the event for new speakers in the Microsoft Data Platform space. This online event is the perfect start for people who have not spoken at any large events before. We are searching for the next generation of speakers who want to take their first steps into the realm of presenting their ideas to an audience. We offer a mentoring program to each chosen speaker. A mentor is a seasoned speaker who will help craft and practice your session. They will also be on hand during the presentation as a host/mentor and be able to offer the support you need to deliver a fantastic presentation.
GroupBy Conference https://groupby.org/ 26-October-2021 27-October-2021 GroupBy is data platform training by the community, for the community. Each session will be 60-minutes in length, followed by 15-minutes for Q and A and 15-minutes for whimsy and fun. After submitting your session, the community votes on their top picks to present October 26-27!
On Tuesday, October 26 GroupBy Americas will present sessions at timeslots accessible for American timezones. On Wednesday, October 27 GroupBy Europe will present sessions at timeslots accessible for European timezones.
SQL Saturday Orlando 2021 https://sqlsaturday.com/2021-10-31-sqlsaturday1021/ 30-Oct-2021 30-Oct-2021 SQL Saturday Orlando is a free one day training event for data platform professionals taking place on 30 Oct, 2021 in Orlando, FL.
Difinity https://difinity.co.nz/ 01-Nov-2021 02-Nov-2021 Difinity is the largest Microsoft Data, AI, Power BI, Power Platform and Business Applications Conference in New Zealand focusing on Data Platform, AI, Business Intelligence, Business Applications, Power Platform, and Analytics.
DataWeekender v4.2 https://www.dataweekender.com/ 06-Nov-2021 06-Nov-2021 A Virtual Popup Conference. Focusing on all Microsoft Data Platform offerings.
PASS Summit 2021 https://passdatacommunitysummit.com/ 08-Nov-2021 12-Nov-2021 PASS Data Community Summit 2021 is the year’s largest gathering of Microsoft data platform professionals. Register today for this free online conference to connect, share, and learn with 1000s of your peers from the global data platform community. Sessions are available in both real-time and on-demand formats, so you can learn at a pace or join Q and A with leading industry experts.
November 2021 Global Azure Data and AI Fest (Modern Data Warehousing) https://nov2021azuredataandaifest.eventbrite.com 12-November-2021 12-November-2021 We are pleased to announce that registration is open for the Fall 2021 Global Azure Data and AI Fest (Modern Data Warehousing), a free/no charge, 1-day virtual conference on Friday, November 12th, 2021, 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM EDT. We will send out the online session link no sooner than 2 days before the event, and also post the online session track information to meetup.com. Since the event is more scaled down due to COVID19 we are virtual only and we are using a single link for the multi-session virtual meeting.
SQL Server Live! https://live360events.com/home.aspx 15-Nov-2021 19-Nov-2021 SQL Server Live!: Providing content for data professionals to do more with their Microsoft data platform investment. Sessions will cover performance tuning, security, reporting, data integration, and modernizing the SQL Server infrastructure.
SQL Server and AzureSQL Conference - Las Vegas https://www.devintersection.com/#!/?track=sql 7-Dec-2021 9-Dec-2021 THE INTERSECTION OF CO-LOCATED TECHNOLOGY EVENTS: Microsoft SQL Server Azure SQL Conference and Azure + AI Conference
DataMinutes #2 http://dataminutes.io 21-Jan-2022 21-Jan-2022 DataMinutes is the fastest event in the Microsoft Data Platform space yet! The whole event will run with 10 minute lightning talks only. That’s 10 minutes per session with no live Q and A. Q and A will be handled through our website afterwards where we will also be posting recordings of each session. "
DataGrillen 2022 http://www.DataGrillen.com 02-June-2022 03-June-2022 Databases, Bratwurst, Bier The most flavoursome Data Platform event on the planet
